value.title: Getting Started with Power BI Desktop in 5 steps
value.excerpt: Getting started with Power BI Desktop is easy! Patrick looks at 5 steps to get you up and running quickly with Power BI Desktop. From downloading, to getting data, and then building your report visuals.  Getting started with Power BI Desktop https://docs.microsoft.com/power-bi/desktop-getting-started
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/BIlyRxHwp8E" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI: How to Combine Multiple Excel Files from a Folder
value.excerpt: Bonus Video part of www.LearnPowerBI.com training program. In this video I explain how you can use Power BI to combine data from multiple excel files. I also show, for complex scenarios, how you can modify the "Sample File" that Power BI Query automatically creates, in order to update the "Custom Function"
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9sfCDCpWTfc" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day - 03: Power BI Reporting - Part 2
value.excerpt: In this video, we demonstrate viewing two reports, one a Power BI report, and the other a paginated report.  The Power BI Paginated Reports in a Day online course aims to empower you as a report author with the technical knowledge required to create, publish, and distribute Power BI paginated reports.

value.title: Understanding Group By Columns in Power BI
value.excerpt: How Power BI uses the Group By Columns attribute of a column and how you can leverage it in specific scenarios.  Article and download: https://sql.bi/790034?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive guide to DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/books/the-definitive-guide-to-dax-2nd-edition/?aff=yt

value.title: Using the SELECTEDVALUE function in DAX
value.excerpt: Learn how the SELECTEDVALUE DAX function simplifies the syntax required in many scenarios where you need to read a single value selected in the filter context. value.title: Why Power BI totals might seem wrong
value.excerpt: A common question is why Power BI totals are inaccurate because they do not display the sum of individual rows. In this video, we explain the reasons why those totals are correct. Article and download: https://sql.bi/772093?aff=yt  How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/?aff=yt The definitive

value.title: 20 tricks to finally master the Matrix visualization in Power BI!!
value.excerpt: The matrix visualization has over 100 configuration options, and some of the most basic functionality, like hiding subtotals is not so easy to discover.  In today's video, I will show you 20 things you can do on the matrix that will take that visualization to the next level.  Did I miss any? Let me know

value.title: Avoid refresh errors when importing files in Power BI
value.excerpt: Have you refreshed Power BI files and got errors due to missing columns or unwanted columns? Here I show you how to avoid new columns for getting added and refresh error from missing columns.  I learnt this by watching Microsoft Power BI webinar with Chris Webb: https://info.microsoft.com/CO-PowerBI-WBNR-FY16-06Jun-21-Amazing-Things-with-Power-BI-Registration.html?Is=Website

value.title: Concatenate/ Merge columns with Power Query, the right way.
value.excerpt: Concatenating columns in Power Query is not hard to do, but depending on the technique you use, you might get unexpected or wrong results. value.title: What is this delta lake thing?
value.excerpt: You may be using a lake for your data and it may just be regular parquet files. In this video, Stijn joins us to explain why you should be using a delta lake instead and how this works in Azure Synapse Analytics.  Connect with Stijn https://twitter.com/SQLStijn  What is Delta Lake https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/synapse-analytics/spark/apache-spark-what-is-delta-lake
